content:
Detailed Guidelines on DGFT & Foreign Trade Services

SEIS, Drawback, RoDTEP, ROSCTL, Warehousing - 
SEIS (Service Exports Incentive Scheme): Incentives on notified services (phased out after 2023).
Drawback: Refund of duties/taxes paid on inputs.
RoDTEP (Remission of Duties and Taxes on Exported Products): Refunds of embedded taxes not rebated by GST.
ROSCTL (Rebate of State & Central Taxes and Levies): Benefits for apparel & made-ups exporters.
Warehousing: Import storage without duty payment for a specified period.
